item.title: About
item.description: Hello World. I'm Ryan. I love R and data. I'm interested in data science, theory of risk, reproducible workflows, visualization, and public policy.

item.title: Rstudioconf2020 Agenda
item.description: I needed to put something together to be able decide what sessions to attend at the upcoming rstudioconf in San Francisco. I wanted to be able to see what was happening concurrently.

item.title: Iterating to a Better Visualization
item.description: A few months ago I was presented with a visualization at work by a colleague who was very excited about it. They were adamant that I add it to the analytics package I was working on.
